mapper.sql: product_id, enterprise_name, approval_announcement_no_enterprise, id, enterprise_address, administrative_id, create_time, isdelete, brand, corporate_representative, approval_announcement_no_enterprise_all, uniform_social_credit_code, approval_authority_enterprise, approval_year, is_first_submission
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from tb_enterprise
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_enterprise (product_id, enterprise_name, approval_announcement_no_enterprise, id, enterprise_address, administrative_id, create_time, isdelete, brand, corporate_representative, approval_announcement_no_enterprise_all, uniform_social_credit_code, approval_authority_enterprise, approval_year, is_first_submission) values (#{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approvalAnnouncementNoEnterprise,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enterpriseAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{administrativeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corporateRepresentative,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approvalAnnouncementNoEnterpriseAll,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uniformSocialCreditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approvalAuthorityEnterprise,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approvalYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isFirstSubmission,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

product_id = #{record.productId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
enterprise_name = #{record.enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
approval_announcement_no_enterprise = #{record.approvalAnnouncementNoEnterprise,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update tb_enterprise
id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
enterprise_address = #{enterpriseAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
administrative_id = #{administrativeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
isdelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
corporate_representative = #{corporateRepresentative,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
approval_announcement_no_enterprise_all = #{approvalAnnouncementNoEnterpriseAll,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
uniform_social_credit_code = #{uniformSocialCreditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
approval_authority_enterprise = #{approvalAuthorityEnterprise,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
approval_year = #{approvalYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_first_submission = #{isFirstSubmission,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and enterprise_name = #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and approval_announcement_no_enterprise = #{approvalAnnouncementNoEnterprise,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tb_enterprise set id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, enterprise_address = #{enterpriseAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, administrative_id = #{administrativeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isdelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, corporate_representative = #{corporateRepresentative,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approval_announcement_no_enterprise_all = #{approvalAnnouncementNoEnterpriseAll,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uniform_social_credit_code = #{uniformSocialCreditCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approval_authority_enterprise = #{approvalAuthorityEnterprise,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approval_year = #{approvalYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_first_submission = #{isFirstSubmission,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and enterprise_name = #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and approval_announcement_no_enterprise = #{approvalAnnouncementNoEnterprise,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT e.enterprise_name AS enterpriseName, e.uniform_social_credit_code AS uniformSocialCreditCode, e.approval_announcement_no_enterprise AS approvalAnnouncementNoEnterprise, e.approval_year AS approvalYear, e.approval_authority_enterprise AS approvalAuthorityEnterprise, e.product_id as productId, p.NAME AS productName FROM tb_enterprise e, tb_product p WHERE e.product_id = p.id
select count(1),approval_year from tb_enterprise where is_first_submission = '未变更' group by approval_year
select DISTINCT approval_year from tb_enterprise where is_first_submission = '未变更'
select id,enterprise_name from tb_enterprise where is_first_submission = '未变更'

select t1.city_id as area ,ifnull(t0.countNum,0) AS countNum from tb_administrative_area t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT
SUBSTR(administrative_id FROM 1 FOR 4) as area , count(1 ) as countNum
administrative_id as area, count( 1 ) as countNum
FROM tb_enterprise enn LEFT JOIN tb_product tpp on enn.product_id = tpp.id where enn.is_first_submission = '未变更'
and enn.approval_year = #{year}
and tpp.classificationId IN ( SELECT classificationId FROM tb_classification WHERE parentId = #{classification} )
and administrative_id in (select city_id from tb_administrative_area where parent_id = #{parentId})
and administrative_id = #{parentId}
GROUP BY SUBSTR(administrative_id FROM 1 FOR 4) ORDER BY count(1) ) t0 on
SUBSTR(t1.city_id, 1, 4) = t0.area
t1.city_id = t0.area
where 1 = 1
and t1.city_id in (select city_id from tb_administrative_area where parent_id = '610000')
and t1.parent_id = #{parentId}
and t1.city_id = #{parentId}
order by countNum

SELECT enn.approval_year as years,COUNT(1) FROM tb_enterprise enn LEFT JOIN tb_product tpp on enn.product_id = tpp.id WHERE enn.is_first_submission = '未变更'
and tpp.classificationId in (select classificationId from tb_classification where parentId = #{classification})
and administrative_id in (select city_id from tb_administrative_area where parent_id = #{parentId})
and administrative_id = #{parentId}
GROUP BY enn.approval_year ORDER BY enn.approval_year

SELECT enterprise_name as enterpriseName, uniform_social_credit_code as uniformSocialCreditCode, approval_announcement_no_enterprise_all as approvalAnnouncementNoEnterpriseAll, approval_year as approvalYear, corporate_representative as corporateRepresentative, enterprise_address as enterpriseAddress, if(is_first_submission = '未变更','核准公告','变更公告') as isFirstSubmission FROM tb_enterprise where product_id = #{productId}

select e.enterprise_name AS enterpriseName, e.uniform_social_credit_code AS uniformSocialCreditCode, e.approval_announcement_no_enterprise AS approvalAnnouncementNoEnterprise, e.approval_year AS approvalYear, e.approval_authority_enterprise AS approvalAuthorityEnterprise, e.product_id as productId, p.NAME AS productName from tb_enterprise e, tb_product p where e.product_id = p.id
and
